name: Auto Login After Registration
author: NetAttingo Technologies

sections.description:
This plugin allows users to easily add a simple user registration form and login form anywhere on their site using simple shortcode.
And provide setting to ‘Auto Login After Registration’.

Follow the follwing steps –

  • Upload the folder “auto-login-after-registration” to “/wp-content/plugins/”
  • Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  • Enable/ disable ‘Auto Login After Registration’ setting by going WP-admin ->Auto Login after Register

  • For registrtion form use below shortcode

    [registration-form]

For login form use below shortcode

[login-form]
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder “auto-login-after-registration” to “/wp-content/plugins/”
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Enable/ disable ‘Auto Login After Registration’ setting by going WP-admin ->Auto Login after Register

  4. For registrtion form use below shortcode

    [registration-form]

For login form use below shortcode

[login-form]
sections.changelog: This is first version no known errors found
